tool_description: Help you to check email valid
name: PyratesMail
title: PyratesMail

api_list.name: Chekc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pyratesapi-pyratesmail-v1.p.rapidapi.com/?email="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pyratesapi-pyratesmail-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
